com.oppahansi.nis.ss17.tasks.oppa.impl

Class Des

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oppahansi.nis.ss17.tasks.oppa.impl.Des

  • public class Des
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents the implementation of DES algorithm

    Author:
    Alexander Schellenberg

      • getRBlockForRound

        public static java.lang.String getRBlockForRound(java.lang.String input,
                                                 int round)

        Gets an R-Block for the given input and the given round.

        Kinda only used for the University task 7.

        Parameters:
        input - 64bit BINARY String
        round - Round nuber
        Returns:
        32bit String

      • applyFeistel

        public static java.lang.String applyFeistel(java.lang.String input,
                                            java.lang.String roundKey)

        Applying the F-Function once with given input 64bit binary String.

        First 32 bits are the L-Block, last 32bits are the R-Block

        Parameters:
        input - 64bit binary String, L-R-Block
        roundKey - 48bit binary String, round key
        Returns:
        L xor R : 32bit binary String

        Parameters:

      • permutedChoiceOne

        private static void permutedChoiceOne(java.lang.String key)

        The 64-bit key is permuted according to the PC-1 table.

        Note only 56 bits of the original key appear in the permuted key.

        Parameters:
        key - Initial key
